title: Mind Body Connection | Chiropractor in Onalaska, WI | Breidenbach Family & Sports Chiropractic
description: Mind Body Connection in Onalaska, WI. Breidenbach Family & Sports Chiropractic is your local Chiropractor in Onalaska serving all of your needs. Call us today at (608) 779-5323 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Whether we're driving a car, riding a bike, or trying to record a spare at our local bowling alley, our musculoskeletal system bases its decision-making on past history, that is, what it has learned before.
